magpie.attributes.generators

Class BaseAttributeGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.attributes.generators.BaseAttributeGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Options
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElementalPropertyAttributeGenerator, ElementalPropertyAttributeGenerator, ElementFractionAttributeGenerator, IonicityAttributeGenerator, LookupTableAttributeGenerator, MeredigAttributeGenerator, ModelPredictionAttributeGenerator, PropertyAsAttributeGenerator, StoichiometricAttributeGenerator, ValenceShellAttributeGenerator

    public abstract class BaseAttributeGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Options
    Base class for objects that generate attributes. These attributes are designed to be in addition to what is already generated by default.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • BaseAttributeGenerator

        public BaseAttributeGenerator()

    • Method Detail

      • addAttributes

        public abstract void addAttributes(Dataset data)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Generate new attributes for a dataset. This operation must both add the new attribute names to the dataset and new values to each entry.
        Parameters:
        data - Dataset to be added to
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        Dataset.addAttribute(java.lang.String, double[])

      • printDescription

        public abstract java.lang.String printDescription(boolean htmlFormat)
        Print out description of attributes.

        Implementation Notes

        Format should look like

        [Full Name of generator]: (Number of attributes) Text description of what these attributes are

        For HTML format, omit the ":".

        Parameters:
        htmlFormat - Whether to print in HTML format
        Returns:
        Description of the attributes
